author: Fox News
title: Ukrainian soldier livestreamed from Snake Island during heroic stand against Russia
description: The island sits 30 miles off the coast of Ukraine and is only .1 square miles in area, but it connects a few cities to a major trading lane.
content:
A Ukrainian soldier on the ill-fated Snake Island was live-streaming as Russian warships opened fire and wiped out the 13 soldiers stationed there. 
Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine … [+1599 chars]
